name: Égaré
description:
In the tales of old...

...there exists a mythical place called Nimilinien - an enchanted forest cave,  where an unknown being called Elidyr lives.  Darkness dwells deep within, one that lead to an unfortunate encounter that cost Elidyr his memories.

Follow Elidyr's story, help him regain his memories & find out what happened.

In case you want to skip the story text, you can do so by pressing ENTER. You can also manually save the game state with pressing U, otherwise it automatically saves  every 30 seconds.

Developer's note 22/04/2022: This was my first own game and it was made for a high school graduation project. I've been working on it for the past 2 months since the start of february 2022.
